price: So today We will preserve your body, so that you will be an example[60] for those who come after you, yet most people are heedless of Our signs.”
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: [60] i.e., his dead body will be preserved, so that people could see that he had actually died and a lesson for later generations.
